content: *bring a bring of summer cheer inside your home with some happy lacy bunting * **pattern notes** this pattern is for two sizes of triangular crocheted motif together with instruction of how to join together as bunting **skill level** *easy/improver* mostly basic stitches with a link to a tutorial for intermediate stitch **yarn** i used cotton yarn but you could use any yarn you like you ll only need a few yards for each triangle **needles/hook** recommended hook for yarn **materials** yarn needle **size** dependant on yarn used **gauge** n/a **pattern includes ** * a full written pattern with clear instructions **pattern written in ** uk terms **translations** swedish follow link below for translation links **cherry heart s cozy corner** please come and join the cherry heart group 1 watch podcasts join crochet/knit alongs share your projects and enjoy yarny chit chat **love to share ** #cherryheart 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/cherry-hearts-cozy-corner
